mapper.select: SELECT CAST(mso.id AS CHAR) AS "id",mso.org_name AS "orgName",mso.org_type AS "orgType",msd.dict_name AS "orgTypeCn",mso.org_description AS "orgDescription",mso.org_sequence AS "orgSequence",CAST(mso.parent_id AS CHAR) AS "parentId",mso.create_time AS "createTime" FROM sys_org mso LEFT JOIN sys_dict msd ON mso.org_type = msd.dict_value AND msd.dict_type = 'org' ORDER BY mso.org_sequence ASC
